(They are? Okay.)

Savage dodges most of the fire, but some clips his feet. He sends a 
firball each at Rachet and Bluestreak, and than looks at the bot he 
just charred. Dinner time. Savage rushes up into the air, and than 
comes down on Striker with his mouth open, ready to bite.
